Interface ICustomerDAO

    public interface ICustomerDAO
    Customer Data Access Object Interface definition
    Author:
    JRQ

    • Method Detail

      • getAllCustomers

        java.util.List<Customer> getAllCustomers()
        Returns:
        All Customer entities registered in the system.

      • getCustomerById

        Customer getCustomerById(java.lang.String customerId)
        Parameters:
        customerId - Customer Identifier
        Returns:
        Customer if found by identifier. null if no customer has been found for the specified identifier.

      • saveCustomer

        void saveCustomer(Customer customer)
        Persists a Customer entity in the system.
        Parameters:
        customer - Entity to be persisted

      • removeCustomerById

        void removeCustomerById(java.lang.String customerId)
        Removes the customer with the given identifier. Do nothing if the customer does not exists in the system.
        Parameters:
        customerId - Customer Identifier
